title: User is brought to the main "Challenge" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN the user has successfully logged into the Application
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be on the Challenge Tab
AND the user will see the Challenge Screen

title: User will see 3 sections on the "Challenges" tab of (Pending, Current & History)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges" tab
custom_expected: THEN we will see three sections of: Current, Pending, & History

title: Message displayed for no "Pending" challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have no Pending Challenges currently available
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we navigate to the Pending section
custom_expected:
THEN the following message will display:

"No Challenges...

[START A CHALLENGE BUTTON]

You currently have no Head to Head Challenges; what are you waiting for?"

title: Message displayed for no "Current" challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have no active Challenges currently available
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we navigate to the Current section
custom_expected:
THEN the following message will display:

"No Challenges...

[START A CHALLENGE BUTTON]

You currently have no Head2Head Challenges; what are you waiting for?"

title: Message displayed for no "History" challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have no previously completed Challenges
AND we have any Pending/Current Challenges
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we navigate to the History section
custom_expected: THEN the following message will display: "No Challenge History"

title: "New" (+) Challenge Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "New" (Plus button) button exists in the top right corner

title: If a "New" Challenge has been initiated, it appears under the "Pending" section after a first pick is made
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we have created a new Challenge
AND we have Drafted our first pick
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Challenge appears under the Pending section of the Challenges Tab

title: Once a draft has been "Completed," the Challenge moves from the "Pending" section to the "Current" section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we have a Challenge available where the draft has been completed
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Challenge is no longer under the "Pending" section
AND we will see that the Challenge is now under the "Current" section

title: Once a "Current" challenge has been completed, it properly moves to the "History" section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we have a Challenge that has just been completed
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Challenge no longer appears under the "Current" section
AND we will see that the Challenge now appears under the "History" section

title: All "Pending" challenges are removed after the Lock Time for each day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we see that the Lock Time has been passed for the "Pending" Challenges
custom_expected: THEN we will see that these specific challenges no longer appear under the "Pending" section

title: "Pending" challenges from the previous day do not show up on the next day if they were not accepted prior to the Lock Time for that day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have previously created some Pending Challenges on the previous day
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see the Pending Challenges from the previous day

title: If a Challenge exists under "Pending," user can see what "Type" of challenge it is
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Pending Challenges currently available
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to see on each challenge the type of Challenge that it is (i.e. Type: General MLB)

title: If a Challenge exists under "Pending," user can see what the "Lock Time" is
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have at least 1 challenge available under the Pending section
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to see the Lock Time(s) of the Challenge(s) that is/are currently under the Pending Section
AND the Lock Time(s) of the Challenge(s) is/are in EST

title: If a Challenge exists under "Current," user will see that the date being displayed for that challenge is correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Challenge available under the "Current" section
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to see that the Date for the Challenge under the "Current" section is correct

title: If a Challenge exists under "History," user can see that the date being displayed for that challenge is correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a challenge available under the "History" section
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Challenge(s) under the "History" section show the correct date for the date that they were created for

title: If a Challenge exists under "History," then the result of that Challenge displays correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "History" section
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Challenge(s) that appear under the "History" section display the result of the particular Challenge correctly

title: If a Challenge exists under "Current," then the start time for a General MLB Challenge is the time of the earliest starting player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Challenge available under the "Current" section
AND the Challenge is an unstarted "General MLB" Challenge
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN a Start Time will be displayed
AND the Start Time listed will display the start time of the drafted player in the Challenge with the earliest start time

title: The 30 most recently completed challenges appear in the History tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND is on the Challenges tab
AND has completed thirty or more challenges
AND these challenges have been scored
custom_steps: WHEN the user goes to the History tab
custom_expected:
THEN they will see the most recent 30 Scored challenges
AND the most recently scored Challenge will be at the top
AND the other challenges will be sorted in Descending order (Newest to Oldest)

title: If the user has more than 30 completed challenges in History, then they can load more by scrolling down
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND is on the Challenges tab
AND has completed more than 30 challenges
AND these challenges have been scored
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to the History tab
AND only the first 30 most recently scored challenges appear
AND scrolls to the bottom of the 30
AND scrolls further
custom_expected:
THEN the next 30 challenges will load
AND these will be sorted correctly
AND the user can keep loading older challenges as they reach the bottom

title: After tapping on the "New" button, the user will be prompted with the "Select your Challenge Type" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the "Select Challenge Type" screen

title: On "Select your Challenge Type" screen, there is a "Cancel" button in the top left
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we see we are on the "Select your Challenge Type" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see a "Back" button in the top left corner

title: On the "Select Challenge Type" screen, if the "Cancel" button is clicked, we are brought back to the Challenges Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenges Tab
AND we have tapped on the "New" button
AND we tap on the "Back" button on the "Select Challenge Type" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought back to the "Challenges Tab"

title: On the "Select Challenge Type" screen, there are two choices of: "General MLB" and "Game Specific"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
custom_expected: THEN we will see that two challenge types exist of: General MLB & Game Specific

title: If the user selects "General MLB" as the Challenge Type, they are brought to a "Select Opponent" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the "General MLB" challenge type
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the "Select Opponent" screen

title: If the user selects "Game Specific" as the Challenge Type, they are brought to a "Choose a Game" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the "Game Specific" Challenge Type
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the "Choose a Game" screen

title: If the user selects "Game Specific" as the Challenge Type and chooses a game, they are brought to a "Select Opponent" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we initiated a "Game Specific" Challenge
AND we are at the "Choose a Game" screen
custom_steps: When we select a game
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the "Select Opponent" screen

title: First time a user enters the "Select Opponent" screen, they will only be allowed to challenge an "MLB.com Expert"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have not connected to Facebook
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we have selected a "Challenge Type"
AND this is the first time we have entered the "Select Opponent" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the only person we can challenge is the "MLB.com Expert"

title: First time a user enters the "Select Opponent" screen, they will be allowed to challenge an "MLB.com Expert" and Facebook Friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have already connected to Facebook
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we have selected a "Challenge Type"
AND this is the first time we have entered the "Select Opponent" screen
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that we can challenge the "MLB.com Expert"
AND we will see that we can challenge other Facebook friends who have registered with the app
AND their bamnet nickname will appear with their corresponding Facebook Profile picture

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, "MLB.com Expert" will always be the first option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a "Challenge Type"
AND we have more then just the "MLB.com Expert" in the opponents list
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "MLB.com Expert" always appears as the first option on the list of opponents to choose from

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, an option to Facebook Connect will appear above the contact list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a "Challenge Type"
custom_expected: THEN we will see on the "Select Opponent" screen that above the contact list rows that there is an option to Facebook Connect

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user logs into Facebook for the first time that they will be prompted with an MLB.com App Authorization message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the "Facebook" button on the "Select Opponent" screen
AND this is the "First Time" we have tapped on the "Facebook" button
custom_expected: THEN we will be prompted with an "MLB.com App Authorization" message asking for permission

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user has logged into Facebook that any of their Facebook friends with the App will appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we have selected a random "Challenge Type"
AND we have previously logged into & granted permission to Facebook
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that in the list of opponents that any of our Facebook friends that have the Application will appear
AND their bamnet nickname will display
AND their Facebook Profile Picture will display

title: After a user has logged into Facebook from the "Select Opponent" screen, they are brought back to "Select Opponent" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we have selected a random "Challenge Type"
AND we attempt to log into Facebook
custom_expected: THEN after we have logged into Facebook we will be brought back to the "Select Opponent" screen

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, there is a "Back" button in the top left
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we are brought to the "Select Opponent" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see in the top left corner exists a "Back" button

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if user tapped on an opponent that we are brought to the draft select screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we select an opponent
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the Draft Selection screen

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, when we see users other then "MLB.com Expert" that we see their points
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenges Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random Challenge Type
AND we see opponents other then "MLB.com Expert"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the other opponents show their points

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, when we have already challenged "MLB.com Expert" to a "General MLB" challenge, we cannot challenge the "MLB.com Expert" to a second "General MLB" Challenge on the same day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenges Tab
AND we have challenged "MLB.com Expert" to a "General MLB" Challenge already today
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select the "General MLB" Challenge Type
AND the list of available opponents displays
custom_expected: THEN "MLB.com Expert" will not be included as an available option in the opponent list

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, when user has already challenged "MLB.com Expert" to a "Game Specific" challenge, we cannot challenge the "MLB.com Expert" to the same game for a "Game Specific" challenge on the same
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenges Tab
AND we have challenged "MLB.com Expert" to a "Game Specific" Challenge already today for a particular game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select the "Game Specific" Challenge Type
AND we choose the previously selected game
AND the list of available opponents displays
custom_expected: THEN "MLB.com Expert" will not be included as an available option in the opponent list

title: After a user selects their first player, they are shown a Draft Overlay pointing to the docked Draft button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND has never performed a draft with this instance of the application on this device before (fresh install)
AND starts a draft of either type
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Infielder position selector
AND is brought to the player selection screen
AND selects a player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the draft screen
AND a transparent black overlay will display
AND this will instruct the user to press the draft button

title: User only receives an instructional Draft Overlay once
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND has already received the instructional Draft Overlay on their device
custom_steps: WHEN the user goes through additional challenge drafts of either type
custom_expected: THEN the user will not receive the Draft Overlay again

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, a button exists to invite friends to download the App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on a random "Challenge Type"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that on the "Select Opponent" screen that a button exists to invite friends to download the Application

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user taps the button to invite friends to download the App then an overlay appears with specific options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head To Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Select Opponent" screen
AND we tap on the "Invite Friends" to download the App button
custom_expected:
THEN an overlay will appear
AND the overlay will contain the options of: Facebook, Twitter, Email & Text Message

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen if the user has selected to invite a friend that a customized message appears for Twitter and Text with a link to the App Store
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try both Twitter and Text invitation types
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each type has a customized message with a link to the App Store for the Head to Head Application

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user has selected to invite an already playing friend through e-mail that the user is added to your friends list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try the E-Mail type
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the user's e-mail is registered by the service as a current player and the user is added to our Friends list

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen if the user has selected to invite a non-playing friend through e-mail that a canned email message is sent with a link to the App Store
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try the E-Mail type
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a canned message is e-mailed with a link to the App Store for the Head to Head Application

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen that if a user has selected to invite a friend via Facebook that they can post on their wall and tag a friend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button to invite friends to download the Application
AND we tap on the Facebook option
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Facebook option allows us to post on our own wall
AND we will see that the Facebook option allows us tag a friend we wish to invite

title: Inviting a friend to play through email who has multiple email addresses that the user is prompted to choose which email address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try the E-Mail type
AND we select a contact who has multiple e-mail addresses in the contact list
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be prompted to select which email address to send the invite to
AND the email will only send to the selected email address

title: The first time a user enters the "Select Opponent" screen that they will be prompted with a message asking for permission to access their Contacts list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we have selected a "Challenge Type"
AND this is the first time that we are entering the "Select Opponent" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Application prompts us for permission to access our Contacts List

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen if the user grants permission to their Contacts list that any of their E-Mail Contacts who have the App will appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Challenges Tab"
AND we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on a random Challenge Type
AND we have entered the "Select Opponent" screen for the first time
AND we have granted permission to the Application to check our Contact Lists
custom_expected: THEN any of the users in our E-Mail Contacts that have the Application will appear in the list of opponents we can select

title: At the bottom of the Draft menu resides an Ad Banner right above the Draft Bar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the point of where we are in the "Draft" menu
custom_expected: THEN we will see that at the bottom of the Draft Menu, but above the Draft Bar exists an Ad Banner

title: Users are unable to draft the same player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Draft Screen"
AND we attempt to select a player that was previously selected
custom_expected: THEN the player will not appear in the available player list as an option

title: When user goes to draft a player that the draft screen shows player statistics for the season for that particular player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Draft Selection" screen
AND we are ready to select a Player
custom_expected: THEN we will see that under each players name are season statistics for that particular player

title: General MLB Challenge: Verify that when we go to draft a player where the game has already started, that the player is not displayed as an available draft option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are competing in a General MLB Challenge Draft
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Draft Selection" screen
AND we are ready to select a Player
custom_expected:
THEN players whose games have already started will be filtered out of the available draft options
AND only players whose games have not yet started will be available for selection

title: Drafting your Team: Verify that during the draft screens, the docked tab bar is not present and is replaced with docked Draft button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are competing in a Challenge Draft (either type)
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the "Draft Selection" screen
custom_expected:
THEN the docked navigation tabs will not be present
AND instead will be a docked Draft button

title: Only four draft selections are available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge"
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the main draft screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that there are only four draft selections available

title: Draft selections are labeled as the following: Infielder, Outfielder, Flex Player & Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge"
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the general draft screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the draft selections that are available for selection would be: Infielder, Outfielder, Flex Player & Pitcher

title: Challenge Initiator makes the first pick of an Infielder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge"
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator looks at the screen for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN they are able to make a pick of an "Infielder"
AND they are unable to select any other position at this time

title: After Challenge Initiator makes their first pick that the Challenge Opponent receives a Push Notification that someone has challenged them
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Push Notifications On
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge"
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator makes their first pick
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will receive a Push Notification that someone has challenged them

title: Iif the Challenge Opponent swipes/taps on the "Challenge" banner/button from the Push Notification Banner/Alert that they will be taken to the draft selection screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND push notifications are ON
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a Push Notification
AND the Challenge Opponent swipes/taps on the Push Notification Banner/Alert
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will be brought to the Draft Selection screen

title: Verify that when the Challenge Opponent initially enters the draft select screen that they can select a Infielder and Outfielder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent enters the Draft Selection screen for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN the Challenge Opponent will be able to select an Infielder
AND the Challenge Opponent will be able to select an Outfielder
AND the Challenge Opponent will NOT be able to select any of the other positions yet

title: After the Challenge Opponent has made their initial moves that the Challenge Initiator receives a Push Notification to make their next draft picks when Push Notifications are on
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Push Notifications on
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent finishes making their initial move
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Initiator will receive a Push Notification to make their next round of draft picks

title: When the Challenge Initiator makes their second pick that they can pick an Outfielder and Flex Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
AND the Challenge Opponent has completed their initial picks
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator enters the Draft Selection screen a second time
custom_expected:
THEN the Challenge Initiator can select an Outfielder
AND the Challenge Initiator can select a Flex Player
AND the Challenge Initiator will be unable to select any other slots at this time

title: When the Challenge Initiator makes their second pick that the Challenge Opponent receives a second Push Notification to make additional picks
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator completes their second pick
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will receive a Push Notification to make additional picks

title: When the Challenge Opponent makes their second pick, the user will pick a Flex Player and a Pitcher

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
AND the Challenge Initiator has completed their second round of picks

custom_expected:
THEN the Challenge Opponent can select a Flex Player
AND the Challenge Opponent can select a Pitcher
AND the Challenge Opponent will be unable to select any other position after that

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Push Notifications On
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent has completed making their second round of picks
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Initiator will receive a Push Notification to make their Final Pick

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
AND the Challenge Opponent has completed their second round of picks
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator enters the Draft Selection screen for a third (final) time
custom_expected:
THEN the Challenge Initiator can pick a Pitcher
AND the Challenge Initiator can't select anything else

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "General MLB Challenge" previously
custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Initiator selects their third (final) pick
AND the Challenge Initiator taps on the "Draft" button
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Initiator will be brought to the "Challenge Lineup" screen

custom_expected:

AND we have started up a "Game Specific Challenge" previously

custom_expected: THEN we will see that the only draft selections available are: Infielder, Outfielder, Flex One & Flex Two

title: Player Draft: Matchup Detail - Batter selection vs. Probable Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have initiated a Challenge (Game Specific OR General MLB)
custom_steps:
WHEN it's the user's turn to draft a batter
AND the user is on the draft selection screen
AND the the user clicks on the 'More' button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Player Detail Pick screen
AND will see the player on the left
AND the probable pitcher on the right
AND see the player's stats against the pitcher at the bottom
AND see the player's season stats
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Select Player'

title: Player Draft: Matchup Detail - Batter selection vs. No Probable Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have initiated a Challenge (Game Specific OR General MLB)
custom_steps:
WHEN it's the user's turn to draft a batter
AND the user is on the draft selection screen
AND the user clicks on the 'More' button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Player Details View
AND will see the players picture the the left
AND see the opposing team's logo to the right
AND see the player's stats vs the opposing team at the bottom
AND see the player's season stats below that
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Select Player'

title: Player Draft: Matchup Detail - Pitcher selection for General MLB Challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have initiated a General MLB Challenge
custom_steps:
WHEN it's the user's turn to draft a pitcher
AND the user is on the draft selection screen
AND the the user clicks on the 'More' button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Player Details View
AND will see the player's picture to the left
AND see the opposing team's logo to the right
AND see the pitcher's stats vs the opposing team at the bottom
AND see the pitcher's season stats below that
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Select Player'

title: Scenario: User presses the Back button from the Matchup Detail Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have initiated a Challenge
AND the user is on the draft selection screen
AND the user has clicked on the 'More' button for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the back arrow in the top left corner
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the player selection screen
AND the player will NOT have been selected

title: Scenario: Users preses the Select Player button from the Matchup Detail Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have initiated a Challenge
AND the user is on the draft selection screen
AND the user has clicked on the 'More' button for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the "Select Player" button at the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Challenge Lineup screen
AND the selected player will appear in the allotted lineup spot
AND the user will be able to press the Draft button to complete their draft once all required selections are made

title: Verify that within the Challenge Lineup screen that users can see the lineups for both teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have started up a "Game Specific Challenge" previously
AND the "Game Specific Challenge" has completed it's draft
custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Initiator
OR the Challenge Opponent goes to the Challenge Lineup screen
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to see the lineup for both teams

title: Within the Challenge Lineup screen that users can see the username for the opponent player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Challenge that has completed the Draft Stage available
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the "Challenge Lineup" screen
custom_expected: THEN we can see the username for the opponent player

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify prior to the start of a game that each player has a "Player Headshot"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge hasn't had any of it's players start in a game yet
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on this particular challenge
AND we look at the Challenge Lineup screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each player in each lineup has a "Player Headshot"

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify prior to the start of a game that each player has a "Last Name"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge hasn't had any of it's players start in a game yet
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Challenge
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each player in each lineup has a "Last Name"

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify prior to the start of a game that each player has an "Opponent Team Code"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge hasn't had any of it's players start in a game yet
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Challenge
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each player in each lineup has an "Opponent Team Code" visible

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify prior to the start of a game that each player has a "Start Time of Game" associated to them
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge hasn't had any of it's players start in a game yet
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Challenge in question
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each player in each lineup has a "Start Time of Game" associated to them

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify prior to the start of a game that each player "Points Earned" reads as "0.0"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge hasn't had any of it's players start in a game yet
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Challenge in question
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each player in each lineup has "0.0" next to the "Points Earned" field

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that when players earn points via their in-game actions that they are properly reflected in the "Challenge Lineup" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had at least 1 player start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on that particular Challenge
AND we see that the player that has started a game has done some in-game actions that would generate them some points
custom_expected: THEN we will see that players point total has properly updated to reflect the actions that they have had in the game so far

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Hitters that Total Bases provided 1 point each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had at least 1 player start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on this particular challenge
AND the player in question has gotten a base
custom_expected: THEN we will see that for each base that the player has gotten that their point total has incremented by 1

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Hitters that Runs Scored provide 1 point each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had at least 1 player start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on this particular Challenge to open it up
AND we see that the player in question has scored at least 1 run
custom_expected: THEN we will see that for each run scored by that particular player that there score increments by 1 point each time

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Hitters that RBI's provide 1 point each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had at least 1 player start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on this particular Challenge
AND we have a player score an RBI
custom_expected: THEN we will see that for each RBI that particular player is attributed with that their point total is increased by 1

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Hitters that Stolen Bases provide 1 point each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had at least 1 player start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on that particular Challenge
AND we have a player steal a base
custom_expected: THEN we will see that for each base that player steals that their point total is incremented by 1 point

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Hitters that Strikeouts are -0.5 points each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had at least 1 player start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on that particular challenge
AND the player we are looking at has struck out
custom_expected: THEN we will see that for each strike out that the player in question has that their point total decrements by -0.5 each time

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Pitchers that Wins are 5 points
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had a pitcher complete a game with a win
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Challenge in question
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Pitcher's score has been incremented by 5 points for the win

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Pitchers that Strikeouts are 0.5 points each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had a Pitcher start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenge in question
AND the pitcher has had at least 1 strikeout
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Pitcher's score increments by 0.5 for each strikeout that they have

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Pitchers that Earned Runs are -0.5 points each
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had a Pitcher start a game
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Challenge in question
AND the Pitcher that is currently pitching has given up at least 1 Earned Run
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Pitcher's stats for the game decrement by -0.5 points per Earned Run that has been given up

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that the Total Score at the bottom of the screen updates properly as various players earn points via their in-game actions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under the "Current" section
AND this Challenge has had multiple players start their games
AND this Challenge has had multiple players score at least some points
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Challenge in question to open it up
AND we look at the "Total Score" at the bottom
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Total Score for each lineup is the sum of the players scores in each individual lineup

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that after all Challenge Players have finished their games that the user with the highest "Total Score" is deemed the challenge winner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge has had all it's players complete their games
AND this Challenge has moved to the "History" tab
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Challenge in question
custom_expected:
THEN we can see that under the Challenge Tab that the Challenge reflects the correct winner along with the correct points for that Challenge
AND we will see if we go inside the Challenge that it reflects the correct winner of that particular Challenge

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that each individual player in the Challenge Lineup is tappable and opens up to a "Scoring Detail" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge available
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Challenge in question
AND we tap on the various players in the Challenge
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Scoring Detail" screen opens up for each player that we have tapped on successfully

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that if we open up a "Scoring Detail" screen that the information provided is only relevant to that nights challenge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge available under the "Current" section
OR we have a Challenge available under the "History" section
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on a Challenge that meets that particular criteria
AND we tap on the various players in that Challenge to look at their "Scoring Detail" screens
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Scoring Detail" screens only show the information for that nights challenge

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify if we are on a "Scoring Detail" screen for a Hitter that we see the specific stats: Total Bases, Runs Scored, RBI, Stolen Bases & Strikeouts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on that particular Challenge
AND we tap on a Hitter to open up their "Scoring Detail" screen
custom_expected: WHEN we look at the "Scoring Detail" screen we can see that they have the specific stats of: Total Bases, Runs Scored, RBI, Stolen Bases & Strikeouts

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that if we are on a "Scoring Detail" screen for a Pitcher that we see the specific stats: Win, Strikeouts & Earned Runs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a "General MLB" challenge visible
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on this particular Challenge
AND we tap on a Pitcher to open up their "Scoring Detail" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Scoring Detail" screen displays the following statistics for the pitcher: Win, Strikeouts & Earned Runs

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that if a Challenge has been completed that the Challenge Lineup is archived and accessible from the main challenge screen under "History"

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that has been completed
custom_steps: WHEN we look for that particular Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN we can see that the Challenge is under the "History" section
AND we are able to fully access that particular Challenge

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify if a "Pending Challenge" is viewed that the user will be taken to the Player lineup screen in the current state of the draft process
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that exists under "Pending"
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on this particular challenge
custom_expected:
THEN we will be brought to the Player lineup screen showing the current state of the draft process
AND the Draft Status should indicate whose turn it is to draft for each individual challenge

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify that an Ad Banner is visible on the Challenge Lineup screen right above the Tab Bar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge currently available to select
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Challenge in question
custom_expected: THEN we can see in the "Challenge Lineup" screen right above the Tab Bar that an Ad Banner is visible

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify if we are on the "Scoring Detail" screen that an Ad Banner is visible right above the Tab Bar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have Challenge available
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on that particular Challenge
AND we tap on a player inside of that Challenge to open up the "Scoring Detail" screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that there is an Ad Banner visible in the "Scoring Detail" screen right above the Tab Bar

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring:  Verify if we are on the "Challenge Lineup" screen that a "Back" button exists in the top left corner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND there is a Challenge available
custom_steps:
WHEN we have navigated on the Challenge in question
AND we look in the top left corner
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Back" button exists

title: Challenge Lineup and Scoring: Verify for Hitters that Postponed games wipe out stats and provide a score of 0
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND has completed a Challenge Draft of either type
AND the challenge is in the Current tab awaiting scoring
AND a hitter's game has been placed into a state of Postponed
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the hitter's scoring stats
custom_expected:
THEN the stat scores will be wiped out
AND all scores will display as 0

title: Verify that each player has a gamestate ribbon associated with them when viewing the challenge lineup screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a draft
AND the draft is currently located in the Current Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
custom_expected: THEN each player will display a ribbon on their headshot showing their game's status

title: ***Messaging: Verify that if a player's game is in "Pregame" mode that the ribbon shows the game's scheduled start time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game has not started
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
AND looks at the player's headshot
custom_expected: THEN the game ribbon will show the scheduled start time in gray

title: ***Messaging: Verify that if a player's game is in "Live" mode that the ribbon shows "Live, {Inning}"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted games is In Progress
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
AND looks at the player's headshot
custom_expected:
THEN the game ribbon will show the current live inning status in Blue
> EX: Live, Bot 6

title: ***Messaging: Verify that if a player's game is in "Final" mode that the ribbon shows "Final"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game has reached the Final state
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
AND looks at the player's headshot
custom_expected: THEN the game ribbon will show the word Final in red

title: ***Messaging: Verify that if a player's game is Postponed that the ribbon shows "Postponed"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game is in a Postponed game state
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
AND looks at the player's headshot
custom_expected: THEN the game ribbon will show the word Postponed in gray

title: ***Messaging: Verify that if a player's game is Suspended that the ribbon shows "Suspended"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game is in a Suspended Game State
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
AND looks at the player's headshot
custom_expected: THEN the game ribbon will show the word Suspended in red

title: ***Messaging: Verify that if a player's game is Cancelled that the ribbon shows "Cancelled"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game is in a Cancelled Game State
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Challenge
AND views the Lineup screen
AND looks at the player's headshot
custom_expected: THEN the game ribbon will show the word Cancelled in gray

title: Challenge Lock Time: (General MLB) - Verify that the lock time to make picks updates based on the selected players earliest start time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge available under the "Pending" section
AND this particular Challenge is of type "General MLB"
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Lock Time for that particular Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Lock Time defaults to the initial player selected by the Challenge Initiator
AND the lock time will update to the earliest start time of additional drafted players

title: Challenge Lock Time: (General MLB) - Verify after the lock time is broached that no more (General MLB) draft challenges can be issued or accepted that day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND the Lock Time for the General MLB Challenge Type has been broached for that particular day
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we attempt to start a "General MLB Challenge"
custom_expected:
THEN we will be unable to start a "General MLB Challenge" for that particular day
AND the game will be created for the following day

title: Challenge Lock Time: (Game Specific) - Verify that the lock time to make picks for a game specific challenge is 1 hour after the start of the game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
AND we have a Challenge that is visible under the "Pending" section
AND this particular Challenge is of type "Game Specific"
custom_steps: WHEN we look at that particular Challenge's Lock Time
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Lock Time" for that particular challenge is 1 hour after the start of the specific game

title: Challenge Lock Time: (Game Specific) - Verify after the lock time is broached for a specific game that no more challenges for that specific game can be done for that day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right
AND we select the Challenge Type of "Game Specific"
AND we attempt to select a game where it's lock time has already been broached (1 hour after the scheduled start time)
custom_expected:
THEN we will be unable to select that particular game to utilize in a "Game Specific" challenge
AND the Game will not appear as an available option to choose

title: Challenge Lock Time: Verify that once all challenges for a particular day have locked then challenges for the next day can be made
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have navigated to the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we verify that all specific challenges have locked for today's date
AND we attempt to click the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we attempt to create a new challenge
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to create a new challenge for the following day without issue
AND we will be unable to create anymore challenges for the current day

title: Challenge Lock Time: Verify if a Pending Challenge Draft is not completed prior to the lock time that the challenge is expired
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
custom_steps: WHEN we have a Pending Challenge that hasn't been completed in a timely manner (i.e. the Lock Time for that Challenge has been broached)
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge will be removed from the "Challenge Tab"

title: Winning a challenge will earn that user 10 MLB Reward Points, plus the amount of points that they have scored in that particular challenge
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
custom_steps: WHEN the user has won a Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN the user will earn 10 MLB Reward Points
AND the user will also get the amount of points that they have scored in that particular challenge added to their point total

title: If a user has won their challenge, their App Profile has updated to display the Reward Points earned
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
custom_steps:
WHEN a user wins a Challenge
AND the user navigates to their App Profile
custom_expected: THEN the user will see that their App Profile has updated to reflect that total amount of Reward Points that they have earned from that particular Challenge

title: Winning anymore than 15 challenges a day does not award any further "Win Points"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have won 15 challenges on a particular day
custom_steps: WHEN we win a 16th challenge
custom_expected: THEN we will not receive a 10 MLB points reward for winning a challenge

title: Accessing a player's scorecard where the game has not started (Game Preview) and At Bat is not installed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user does not have At Bat installed
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game has not started
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the player lineup screen for the Challenge
AND selects the player's scorecard
custom_expected:
THEN the bottom of the scorecard will display a "Game Preview" button
AND tapping on Game Preview will bring the user to the App Store to download At Bat

title: Accessing a player's scorecard where the game has not started (Game Preview) and At Bat is installed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has At Bat installed
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game has not started
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the player lineup screen for the Challenge
AND selects the player's scorecard
custom_expected:
THEN the bottom of the scorecard will display a "Game Preview" button
AND tapping on Game Preview Fast-App switch to the At Bat Game Preview

title: Accessing a player's scorecard where their game is Live (Follow Live in At Bat) and At Bat is not installed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user does not have At Bat installed
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted games is In Progress
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the player lineup screen for the Challenge
AND selects the player's scorecard
custom_expected:
THEN the bottom of the scorecard will display a "Follow Live in At Bat" button
AND tapping on "Follow Lie in At Bat" will bring the user to the App Store to download At Bat

title: Accessing a player's scorecard where their game is Live (Follow Live in At Bat) and At Bat is installed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has At Bat installed
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted games is In Progress
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the player lineup screen for the Challenge
AND selects the player's scorecard
custom_expected:
THEN the bottom of the scorecard will display a "Follow Live in At Bat" button
AND tapping on "Follow Lie in At Bat" will Fast-app switch to the associated Live Box Score in At Bat

title: Accessing a player's scorecard where their game has reached the Final state and At Bat is not installed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user does not have At Bat installed
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game has reached the Final state
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the player lineup screen for the Challenge
AND selects the player's scorecard
custom_expected:
THEN the bottom of the scorecard will display a "Final Box Score" button
AND tapping on Final Box Score will bring the user to the App Store to download At Bat

title: Playercard where their game has reached the Final state and At Bat is installed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user has At Bat installed
AND the user has completed a Draft
AND the Challenge is now listed in the Current Tab
AND at least one of the player's drafted game has reached the Final state
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the player lineup screen for the Challenge
AND selects the player's scorecard
custom_expected:
THEN the bottom of the scorecard will display a "Final Box Score" button
AND tapping on Final Box Score will Fast-app switch to At Bat and launch the associated Final Box Score
